website_summaries.verdict: Pigmented gold lip gloss adds depth and a metallic-like shimmer to matte lips.
pros: Metallic finish adds shimmer and depth when paired with a matte lipstick but wears well on its own, too
Gold color is highly pigmented and comes out with just one swipe
Lip gloss tube is aesthetically pleasing and comfortable to hold
cons: try not to apply too much product at once

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I loved this. Depending on how prominent you want the color, you can add more layers.
customer_reviews.author: CJ Julee

customer_reviews.title: Real gold
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for like a real solid metal looking gold, this is more sparkly/glittery..so I would give this 4 stars but there’s real gold in it so 5 stars . This photo is after it’s been rubbed off a bit so it’s not super true
customer_reviews.author: KAP

customer_reviews.title: Really pretty
customer_reviews.text: This product adds really pretty golden shine to your lips. It doesn't stay on too long because it is a gloss, but I really like it.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Fun good quality
customer_reviews.text: Got my daughter and I matching gold lipsticks to wear to see Hamilton. Super cute. Good quality stays on a long time even with eating and drinking. So then we Bought 2 more for her friends as gifts. Not an everyday lipstick. But nice for fun
customer_reviews.author: jen

customer_reviews.title: it looks great on
customer_reviews.text: Loved it! great color, nice texture, moisturizing, feels and looks great on
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline Caldwell

customer_reviews.title: Multiple uses
customer_reviews.text: I love this, one of my faves. I use it with my MAC gloss and also as eye shadow. Very pretty. Get lots of compliments.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Harris

customer_reviews.title: Received empty tube!
customer_reviews.text: This arrived completely EMPTY!! There is barely a speck of product at the tip of the applicator.
customer_reviews.author: Robertskidad

customer_reviews.title: Nice but different
customer_reviews.text: It wasn’t consistent with what I purchased in the past but it was nice. It was not as golden but a little bronze but beautiful
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: GLAMOROUS
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a real gold lip gloss for years... tried many other messy lipsticks but that one is the best, even after the goldish color fades, the glitter still shown on your lips which is amazing!! I received many compliments cuz it simply takes your makeup to a different level! Will definitely buy again
customer_reviews.author: Lena

customer_reviews.title: Golden Shine
customer_reviews.text: This is great lip gloss, takes very little to produce beautiful golden glossy lips! I get many compliments every time I wear it!
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: It's an okay glitter
customer_reviews.text: I thought this would be a nice, metallic gold. It IS, but it does not apply evenly and just looks odd. I still use it, but I wipe off as much as I can and enjoy the gold shimmer look.
customer_reviews.author: kamccoy

customer_reviews.title: No. Like a glittery, sticky liquid eyeshadow that won't wash off
customer_reviews.text: I've been looking for something to replace Colourpop's metallic lip formula for a while, this isn't it. The glittery particles are too large to give a metallic sheen and they get everywhere and stay there when you try to wash them off. Won't use it again. Only giving two stars because it might make a good liquid eyeshadow and the packaging is clean looking.
customer_reviews.author: Kzzephyr

customer_reviews.title: Gold goddess lips💋💋
customer_reviews.text: This is the best gold lipstick I have purchased in a year.
customer_reviews.author: sunshine

customer_reviews.title: It was okay
customer_reviews.text: This product definitely stays on your skin is very long lasting but I'm a makeup lover so I just bought it just to buy it I'm really not fond of the formula in the way that it looks or my skin
customer_reviews.author: SAS💋

customer_reviews.title: Super gold
customer_reviews.text: Great color saturation. I didn’t expect it to be as glittery as it is (gave 4 stars for my preference). I thought it would be more metallic. But otherwise great!
customer_reviews.author: Louise

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful shimmer..
customer_reviews.text: This gold lip gloss is not to wear alone but on top of any lipstick you choose. This adds a shimmer of gold and turns your own lipstick into a beautiful shade! You can even put it on top of another lip gloss and it turns it into a completely different color..stunning! I absolutely LOVE this gold lip gloss! Great for summer, fall or winter, especially the holidays! Try this lip gloss with ALL of your lip sticks & lip glosses, play with the colors and see just how versatile it truly is!
customer_reviews.author: Purplehearts

product_meta.title: Too Faced Melted Gold Liquified Lip Gloss
product_meta.description: Too Faced Melted Gold Liquified Gold Lip Gloss Shade - Pure Gold Full Size: 0.23 Fl. OZ. / 7 mL
feature_bullets: Too Faced Melted Gold Liquified Lip Gloss
